description: Request message for updating a database group.

allowMissing.description:
If set to true, and the database group is not found, a new database group will be created.
 In this situation, `update_mask` is ignored.

databaseGroup.description:
The database group's `name` field is used to identify the database group to update.
 Format: projects/{project}/databaseGroups/{databaseGroup}
databaseGroup.title: The database group to update.

updateMask.description: The list of fields to update.

title: Update Database Group Request
